trans-unit.source: Provides initialization settings for the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> XAML writer implementation.
The defaults for all XamlXmlWriterSettings values are `false`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterSettings"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> should always assume valid XAML input for purposes of duplicate resolution or other error checking.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> skips certain validation or error checks, such as throwing exceptions on duplicate members.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> throws exceptions when invalid XAML is encountered.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> should close immediately on <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""></xref> or other operations, or whether the XAML writer should instead write the buffer output before closing.
Use this setting with caution; closing immediately can result in invalid XAML that cannot be loaded again.

This setting influences the logic of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, which calls `Close` on the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> or <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> when CloseOutput is `true`; or it calls <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter.Flush%2A> (again tied to the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> or <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>) if CloseOutput is `false`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> immediately closes on a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose" name="Dispose" href=""></xref> or similar operations.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the remaining buffer output is written before the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter"></xref> is released.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a copy of this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriterSettings"></xref> instance.
